A ranar 31 ga Disamba, 2019, aka bayar da rahoton matsala na pneumonia da aikace-aikacen da ba a san ba a Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana jani na cutar a matsayin koronavirus na musamman wanda aka yi imani da shi a yanzu a matsayin koronavirus na musamman na cutar da hankali da hankali (SARS-CoV-2).

A cikin kashi 14% na lokuta, COVID-19 ya zama cutar da ke da rauni mai tsanani wanda ya buƙaci ajiyar jirgin sama, yayin da kashi 6% na lokuta ke da rauni mai tsanani wanda ya buƙaci gaggawa.
Matsakaicin mutanen da aka yi rajista a wajen wuraren zaman masu yawon bude ido ne kawai za su yi rajista. Ko da yake, hakan ya sa dokar ta zama wata iri, da bata fito baro-baro ba.
A wannan bincike, mu ne ke tantance irin tasirin COVID-19 a kowace ƙasa a cikin European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) da United Kingdom (UK) da kuma su kawo su cikin Hubei Province, China.
Mu kuma ke kwatanta adadin masu cutar COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya da adadin da ake samu a Italiya a ranakun 31 ga Janairu zuwa 15 ga Maris 2020.
Kwayar cutar Covid-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya
Bayan kasar Sin, cutar Covid-19 ta ci gaba da yaduwa a fadin duniya kuma yanayin cutar Covid-19 a cikin duniyar da ba kasar Sin ba ya yi daidai da wannan kasar.
A ranar 11 ga Maris 2020, Shugaban Kasa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (WHO) ya tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya zama pandemiyar.

A cikin 5 ga watan Maris na Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri da sauransu sun bayyana a cikin ƙungiyar ta farko da aka tabbatar da COVID-19 a cikin yankin Turai kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin ƙungiyar ta WHO.
A cikin EU/EEA, an sanar da na farko na biyu na tabbatarwa da aka yi a Faransa a ranar 24 ga watan Janairu 2020 a cikin mutanen da suka dawo daga Wuhan, jihar Hubei, kasar Sin.

A ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020, an samar da rahoton COVID-19 a duk 30 kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya (UK), inda a tsakanin ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019 zuwa wannan ranar, an bayyana cewa an samar da rahoton 39,768 da 1,727 mutuwa, tare da rahoton 17,750 da 1,441 mutuwa daga kasar Italiya.
Samun adadin kasa da kasa da adadin kasa da kasa na cutar Covid-19

A cibiyar European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), bayanan COVID-19 da ake bayyana a kowace ƙasa a duniya, wanda aka samu daga kawai sassan hukumomin jama'a na ƙasashe, hukumomin jama'a na ƙasashe da kuma hukumar kare lafiya ta duniya, ana ƙara su kowace rana a 8:00 na safe.
Wadannan bayanan an amfani da su don yin bayyana ayyukan cutar Covid-19 a cikin EU/EEA da kuma Birtaniya, da kuma yin kiyayewa da shi a Italiya.

A matsayin wakilci na yawan cutar Covid-19, muka yi imanin cewa 14-day truncated cumulative incidence na cutar Covid-19, don haka, muka ba da shawarar aikin cutar Covid-19 a kowace ƙasa ta EU/EEA da Burtaniya, a cikin lokacin 1 Janairu–15 Maris 2020.
Kuma kuma muna bayyana adadin kowane kasar da aka yi bayani a ranar 15 ga Maris 2020 8:00 a.m. da kuma da kuma kasar Italiya a cikin lokacin 31 ga Janairu–15 ga Maris 2020.
Bayyanar da cutar Covid-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya
Tasirin COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya a cikin shekaru 14 ya yi kama da tasirin Hubei Province (China) (Rana 1).

A cikin EU/EEA da kuma kasashen da ke cikin kungiyar UK a gaba, yawan juna da COVID-19 ya fara zama mai yawa a ranar 21 ga watan Fabrairu kuma ya ci gaba da zama mai yawa a ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu 2020 (Supplementary material).

Wannan ya kasance galibi ne saboda karuwar saurin da aka yi bayyana a Italiya, amma duk kasashen EU/EEA da kasar Burtaniya sun nuna irin wannan irin karuwar a cikin adadin COVID-19 (Supplementary material).
Farko 2 ya nuna adadin COVID-19, a cikin kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya da kuma da italiya don lokacin 31 ga Janairu–15 ga Maris 2020.

Babban cutar Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), wacce ta haifar da cututtukan jini (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), ta kashe fiye da 3,000 mutane da kuma cire fiye da 80,000 a China da sauran duniya, wanda ya haifar da nasarar mutane.

Irinsu da cutarinsu, SARS-CoV, wacce ta haifar da cutar SARS a cikin mutane da dama a shekara ta 2003, SARS-CoV-2 kuma zai iya yaduwa daga karkashin ƴan ƙwari da kuma haifar da alamun irinsu ta hanyar alamun irinsu.
Ko da yake, COVID-19 ya daidaita girma da mutuwa fiye da SARS amma ya zama da yawa da ya shafi mutane masu shekaru da yawa fiye da matasa da kuma maza fiye da mata.

Babbar cutar ta fara ne a Wuhan, kasar Sin, kuma ta tashi cikin tsawon kasar da kuma zuwa kusan 50 a fadin duniya.
A ranar 2 ga watan Maris 2020, cutar ta haifar da yawan mutane 80,000 da suka tabbatar da cutar COVID-19, da kuma mutane 40,000 da aka fitar da su da kuma mutane 3,000 da suka mutu.

Zuwa karshe, zamu yi magana ne kan abubuwan da muka samu a wannan lokacin game da hanyoyin cin zarafin lafiya da kuma bayyana abubuwan da suka wuce a wannan lokacin.

Ko da yake a wannan shekaru, muka samu CoV na mutum da ke da lafiya ta hanyar mutane biyu, i.e., SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, waɗanda suka haifar da haɓakawa da farko a China a shekarar 2003 da Saudi Arabia a shekarar 2012, bi da bi, kuma suka tashi zuwa ƙasashe da dama da lafiya da mutuwa.
Don haka, cutar Covid-19 na yanzu ita ce cutar CoV ta uku a cikin tarihin rayuwar mutane.
Kamar yadda aka nuna a Rana. ​Rana.1,1, kungiyoyi na pneumonia da asalin su ba a san ba, an bayyana a Wuhan a ranar 31 ga Disamba, 2019 zuwa Majalisar Lafiya ta China.
Bayan shekaru hudu an bayar da jerin CoV.
A ranar Janairu 15, 2020, an bayyana wani mutuwar farko daga Wuhan.
A cikin wannan lokacin, cutar ta fasa cikin tsawon lokaci zuwa garuruwan da yankuna da ƙasashe masu kusa.
A ranar 20 ga Janairu, an bayyana cewa masu kula da lafiya sun sami cutarwa, wanda ya nuna cewa zubar da cutarwa daga ɗan adam zuwa ɗan adam zai iya faruwa.
A ranar 23 ga watan Janairu, birnin Wuhan ya kasance an kare shi da duk tashoshin sufuri na al'umma.

A ranar 24 ga watan Janairu, an buga labarin farko kan al'amuran shari'ar lafiya wanda ya bayyana cewa, daga cikin mutanen 41 da aka tabbatar da cewa suna fama da cutar, kawai 21 ke da alaƙa da kasuwancin kifi na Wuhan wanda ake ganin shi a matsayin wurin farawa na cutar daga ƙarƙashin ɗan adam.
A ranar 30 ga watan Janairu, WHO ta tabbatar da cewa annoba ta zama matsala ta lafiya a duniya.
A lokacin da aka rubuta wannan rahoton, cutar ta yi kama a duk kasar China da kuma kusan 50 kasashen duniya da ke cikin duniyar (Rai. ​(Rai.2).2).
Tun da matsalar tana canzawa cikin tsawon lokaci, irin tasirin da kuma matsalar da ke faruwa za a iya tantance su.

A ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, aikin bincike na jama'a a kan 8,866 masu lafiya ciki har da 4,021 masu ciwon COVID-19 ya bayyana bayani mai zuwa a matsayin bayani mai zuwa (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).
SARS-CoV-2 ya kama mutane daga dukkan lokutan rayuwa, amma kawai a shekarun 30-65.
Kusan kashi daya (47.7%) na mutanen da suka shiga cikin cutarwa sun fi shekaru 50, wasu da dama sun fi shekaru 20, kuma kawai 14 na mutanen da suka shiga cikin cutarwa sun fi shekaru 10.
SARS-CoV-2 ya kama maza (0.31/100,000) fi yawan mata (0.27/100,000).
COVID-19 ya ƙaru a cikin ƙungiyoyi da ke cikin da kusa da Hubei.
Cutar Covid-19 ta dauki lokaci mai tsawo na kwanaki 5 (2-9) daga farawa har zuwa tabbatarwa.
Lokacin daidaita incubation ya kasance 4.8 (3.0-7.2) kwanaki.
Lokacin da aka fara shiga har zuwa mutuwa ya kasance 9.5 (4.8-13) rana.
Rikitar da ƙwayoyin cuta (R0) na ƙarshe ya kasance 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), kuma R0 na ƙarshe ya kasance 2.23-4.82.
Yawan mutanen da suka shiga cikin cutar ya karu da tsari kafin 23 ga Janairu 2020, ya danganci lokacin da aka yi amfani da jiragen ruwa kafin bikin Spring a kasar Sin.

A ranar 6 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, tawarar mu ta buga shawarar harka mai tsawon lokaci don nazarin da aikin da ke da alaƙa da 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) da kuma aikin da ke da alaƙa da 2019-nCoV, da wannan shawarar harka ta bayyana nasarar mu da kuma aikin da ke da alaƙa da 2019-nCoV.

A ranar 13 ga watan Maris na shekarar 2020, rahoton da ba a tabbatar da shi ba daga South China Morning Post ya bayyana cewa, matsala da aka tsara zuwa ranar 17 ga watan Nuwamba 2019, a cikin mutum mai shekaru 55 daga jihar Hubei, zai iya zama na farko. A ranar 26 ga watan Fabrairu 2020, WHO ya bayyana cewa, saboda matsalolin da aka bayyana cewa suka ragu a China amma suka karu a Italiya, Iran, da kuma Koriya ta Kudu, yawan matsalolin da aka bayyana cewa suka ragu a wajen China ya kai yawan matsalolin da aka bayyana cewa suka ragu a cikin China na farko.

Shari’ar farko da aka sani na cutar coronavirus ta fara ne a ranar 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan, Hubei, China.
A cikin wata, yawan cutar coronavirus a Hubei ya karu cikin tsari.

A ranar 30 ga Disamba, kungiyar likitoci a Jami'ar Wuhan ta yi bayani ga abokan aikinsu game da "coronavirus na SARS".
Na biyar daga cikin wadannan likitocin, ciki har da Li Wenliang, suka amsa a hannun jami'an siyasa don yin watsa labarai, kuma wani, Ai Fen, ya amsa a hannun shugabanninsa don yin watsa labarai.
Hukumar lafiya ta birnin Wuhan ta fitar da sanarwar jama'a a ranar 31 Disamba kuma ta bayyana ga Majalisar Dinkin Duniya.

An ba da rahoton samun matsalan pneumonia da ba a san shi ba zuwa hukumomin lafiya a Wuhan don sauya bincike a farkon Janairu. A lokutan farko na cutar, adadin matsaloli ya ƙara kusan kowace rana guda shida da rabi.
A farkon da tsakanin watan Janairu na 2020, cutar ta fasa zuwa lardunin kasar Sin, tare da taimako daga yakin jirgin kasa da kuma Wuhan da ke aiki a matsayin wurin jirgin kasa.
A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, China ta bayyana cewa akwai kimanin 140 matsala a cikin ɗayan rana, ciki har da mutane biyu a Beijing da ɗayan a Shenzhen.

Bayanan da ke cikin ofishin kasa ya nuna cewa a ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, 2020, mutane 6,174 suka samu alamun cutar. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, Amurka ta zarce kasar Sin da Italiya a matsayin mafi girman kasuwa a duniya. A ranar 9 ga watan Afrilu, 2020, akwai kimanin mutane 1.61 miliyan da suka samu cutar a duniya; akwai kimanin mutane 97,000 da suka mutu kuma akwai kimanin mutane 364,000 da suka fitar da cutar.
Kusan 200 ƙasashe da ƙasashen yanki sun sami aƙalla wani abu.
Saboda cutar ta COVID-19 a Turai, akwai kasashen da ke cikin yankin Schengen da suka hana haɗin kai da suka ƙaddara iyakar ƙasa.

A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilu, kusan mutane miliyan 300, ko kusan kashi 90% na yawan jama'a, suna cikin ajiyar wurin a Amurka, kusan mutane miliyan 50 suna cikin ajiyar wurin a Filipin, kusan mutane miliyan 59 suna cikin ajiyar wurin a Afirka ta Kudu, kuma mutane miliyan 1.3 suna cikin ajiyar wurin a Indiya.

A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, mutane 1.7 biliyoyin duniya suka kasance a cikin wani tsari na karewa, wanda ya karu zuwa mutane 2.6 biliyoyin biyu na rana da suka gabata—kusan kashi uku na yawan jama'ar duniya.

An fitar da bayanin jama'a daga Wuhan Municipal Health Commission a ranar 31 Disamba.

COVID-19 ya tabbatar da ya yi faduwa zuwa Koriya ta Kudu a ranar 20 ga watan Janairun 2020 daga China.

Hukumar lafiya ta ƙasa ta bayyana ci gaba mai mahimmanci a cikin matsalolin da ake tabbatarwa a ranar 20 ga watan Fabrairu, wanda aka sauya zuwa taron a Daegu na ƙungiyar addini ta Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
Masu addini na Shincheonji da ke ziyartar Daegu daga Wuhan an zargi su a matsayin asalin cutar.
A ranar 22 ga watan Fabrairu, cikin 9,336 masu kula da cocin, 1,261 ko kusan kashi 13% sun bayyana alamun. Jamhuriyar Koriya ta tabbatar da matsin lamba mafi girma a ranar 23 ga watan Fabrairu 2020.
A ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu, akwai kimanin 2,000 matsala da aka tabbatar da su a kasar Koriya, wanda ya tashi zuwa 3,150 a ranar 29 ga watan Fabrairu.
Kowace rundunar sojojin Koriya ta yi karantawa bayan gwajin ya tabbatar da cewa sojojin uku suna da kwayar cutar.

Ƙididdiga na hanyoyin jiragen sama da kuma sauran abubuwan da suka shafi an canza su. Gyaran yanayin jiki don cutar coronavirus ta hanyoyin sadarwa 2019 (COVID-19) da kuma cutar SARS-CoV-2 da ke da alaƙa sun haɗa da hanyoyin da suka tabbatar da cewa akwai cutar da kuma hanyoyin da suka tabbatar da cewa akwai abubuwan da ke da alaƙa da kamuwa da cutar.
Yuwuwar cututtukan bakarar jini a cikin abubuwan da ake samu ana tabbatar da su ta hanyar RT-PCR, wanda ke nuna cututtukan bakarar jini na coronavirus.
Wannan testin yana da alaƙa da kuma ana ƙirƙirar shi don ya gano RNA na virus na SARS-CoV-2.
An yi amfani da shi don tabbatar da cututtukan da suka fara faruwa ko cututtukan da suka faruwa.
Bincike da aka yi na abubuwan da suka dace (serology) za a iya amfani da su don nazarin daidaitaccen yanayin jiki.

Bincike da aka yi kan hanyoyin maganin kwayoyin halitta sun nuna yawan mutane da suka shafe cutar, ciki har da wadanda masu matsaloli suna da matsaloli da ba su da matsala ba ko kuma wadanda ba su da matsala.
Ana iya ƙididdige adadin mutanen da suka mutu daga cutar da ƙimar ƙarfi a cikin jama'a daga sakamakon aikin da aka yi.
Idan an yi kauri da kauri, a watan Maris na shekarar 2020, ba a samu bayanai da ke da inganci game da yawan cutar a cikin jama'ar su.
A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, ba ƙasa ɗaya ba ta yi testin fiye da kashi 3% na ƙasarsu, kuma akwai bambance-bambancen da yawa a cikin yawan testin da aka yi a cikin ƙasashe.
Ko da yake, wannan bambance-bambancen kuma zai iya tasiri sosai kan adadin mutanen da suka rasa rayuwa, wanda zai iya zama daidaitaccen daidaita a wasu kasashe.

Amfani da real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ana iya gudanar da test a cikin abubuwan da suka samu daga hanyoyi da dama, ciki har da nasopharyngeal swab ko sputum sample.
Sakamakon su na iya samu a cikin sa'o'i 2 zuwa 2.
Binciken RT-PCR da aka yi tare da swabs na gwiwa ba shi da inganci ba a cikin mako na farko na cutar.
Bayan haka, cutar zai iya tsaya a cikin kwauro yayin da ta ci gaba da zama a cikin jiki.

Don mutane masu cutarwa da ake testa a matsayin na biyu, ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa da ke cikin zurfi ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma ana iya amfani da kayan aikin da aka samu daga cikin hanyoyin ruwa

Wani daga cikin PCR na farko an shirya a Charité a Berlin a watan Janairu 2020 ta amfani da real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), da ya zama madogarar 250,000 kit don rarraba da kungiyar lafiya duniya (WHO).

A cikin kasar Birtaniya kuma an kirkiro wani test a ranar 23 ga watan Janairu 2020. Kuma kamfanin kasar Koriya ta Koriya Kogenebiotech ya kirkiro wani kitin da ke nuna SARS-CoV-2 (PowerChek Coronavirus) a ranar 28 ga watan Janairu 2020.

A cikin kasar Sin, BGI Group ya kasance daya daga cikin manyan kamfanoni na farko da aka ba shi izinin amfani a cikin yanayin da ake buƙata daga Hukumar Kula da Kayayyaki ta Kasa ta Sin don kitin da ya yi amfani da PCR don gano SARS-CoV-2. A Amurka, Hukumar Kula da Layin Tsaro ta Amurka (CDC) tana ba da 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel zuwa cibiyoyin kula da lafiya ta hanyar International Reagent Resource.

Babban labarin da aka yi da ƙayyadaddun biyu ba su daidai ba har zuwa 28 ga watan Fabrairu 2020, kuma ba a cikin wannan lokacin ba har zuwa wannan lokacin ba cewa makarantun jihar da kuma makarantun jihar suka amince da shawarar.
Gwajin ya amince da shi ta hanyar Hukumar Kula da Kayayyaki da Masana'antu ta Amurka ta hanyar Izinin Amfani da Shari'ar Tsaro.
A ranar 5 ga watan Maris 2020 LabCorp ya bayyana cewa kwayar cutar Covid-19 ta kasance a cikin yanayi na ƙasa.
Kuma, Quest Diagnostics ya ba da gwajin COVID-19 na ƙasa da ƙasa kamar yadda ya kamata a ranar 9 ga Maris 2020.
Ba a bayar da rahoton buƙatun adadin ba; samar da samfuran da ake buƙata za a yi kamar yadda CDC ke buƙata.
A Rasha, waƙilin COVID-19 ya haɗa kuma ya samar da shi ta Cibiyar Kimiyyar Duniya ta Virology da Biotechnology VECTOR.

A ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu 2020, gwajin ya kasance an rubuta shi ta hanyar Hukumar Kula da Lafiya ta Tarayyar Rasha.A ranar 12 ga watan Maris 2020, Makarantar Mayo Clinic ta bayyana cewa ta samar da gwajin wanda zai iya zubar da cutar COVID-19.A ranar 13 ga watan Maris 2020, Roche Diagnostics ta samu izinin FDA don gwajin wanda zai iya yin a cikin sa'o'i 3.5 a cikin yawan girma, don haka za a iya aikin jirgin ɗaya a cikin sa'o'i 4,128 a cikin lokacin 24.

A ranar 19 ga Maris 2020, FDA ya ba da izinin amfani da aiki na tsari (EUA) ga Abbott Laboratories don aikin da ke a cikin m2000 na Abbott; FDA ya ba da izinin amfani da aikin da ke a cikin Hologic, LabCorp, da Thermo Fisher Scientific.
A ranar 21 ga Maris 2020, Cepheid kuma ya sami EUA daga FDA don aikin da ya dauka kusan mintuna 45.
FDA ya amince da gwajin da ke amfani da teknoloji ta isothermal nucleic acid amplification a matsayin wani bangare na PCR.
Kamar yadda wannan ba a buƙatar jerin lokutan juyawa na tsawon lokaci ba, wannan hanyar na iya samun nasarar daidai a cikin mintuna 5 da nasarar daidai a cikin mintuna 13.

Yanzu akwai kusan 18,000 na wannan masana'anta a kasar Amurka kuma Abbott ya umarci yin amfani da shi don samun 50,000 a kowace rana.A test wanda ya amfani da monoclonal antibody wanda ya shafi protein na nucleocapsid (N protein) na koronavirus na zamani ana ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba a Taiwan, tare da umarnin cewa zai iya bayyana a cikin 15 zuwa 20 mintuna kamar test na influenza mai tsawon lokaci.
